DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of samples associated with a subset of a larger population  associated with systematic investigation into a subject.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.:1. A subset of a larger population, selected for investigation to draw conclusions or make estimates about the larger population. 2. The number of subjects in a clinical trial. 3. Number of subjects required for primary analysis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.

Concepts.definition: Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.

Property.preferredDefinition: 1. A subset of a larger population, selected for investigation to draw conclusions or make estimates about the larger population. 2. The number of subjects in a clinical trial. 3. Number of subjects required for primary analysis.

Concepts.definition: 1. A subset of a larger population, selected for investigation to draw conclusions or make estimates about the larger population. 2. The number of subjects in a clinical trial. 3. Number of subjects required for primary analysis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 2/20/24 AI released per SME/Amanda Bell approval.ls5/17/23 changed origin to CDS. BF; 11/5/22 created for CDS data element. jk

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.administrativeNotes: 9/25/23: Released  melanoma  AI per 3Q23 metric report review. LS

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDS
ReferenceDocuments.description: Please use natural numbers; do not use abbreviations or units (e.g. avoid using "1k" or "one thousand")
